content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia where two parties are involved the case went through several steps including a cost procedure to determine the amount of money to be paid the court then made a decision in the first instance judgment the case was later reviewed by the supreme court which awarded compensation the final resolution of the case involved the distribution of assets specifically a real estate property furniture and two cars the court determined that the plaintiff would receive 75 of the assets while the defendant would receive 25 the supreme court dismissed an application for revision meaning that the decision was final the case involved the application of the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the defendant argued for a revision claiming procedural errors and the need to assess the property value after renovations the court ultimately dismissed the application and ordered the applicant to bear the costs of the proceedings

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Vrhovnega sodišča RS II Ips 195/2017, 14. 9. 2017
